original_text: It will be very bad for you! You cause your neighbours to become drunk. You are so angry that you make them drink too much wine. You are happy when they are so drunk that you can see their bare bodies. The neighbours are probably the nations near to Babylon that Babylon has attacked. It will be very bad for you! You cause your neighbours to become drunk. You are so angry that you make them drink too much wine. You are happy when they are so drunk that you can see their bare bodies.
korean_text: 이웃에게 술을 마시게 하되 자기의 분노를 더하여 그에게 취하게 하고 그 하체를 드러내려 하는 자에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you!
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 매우 나쁜 일이 있을 것이다!

sentences.original_text: You cause your neighbours to become drunk.
that you make them drink too much wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너무 많은 포도주를 마시게 만든다.

sentences.original_text: that you can see their bare bodies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 나체를 볼 수 있을 때.
